EmailTemplate.subject: Critical Case Opened for SW Maintenance Contract without EME Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case {!Case.CaseNumber} is requiring your attention.
Customer {!Case.CH_AccountNameforNotifications__c} has requested EME services. However CDB contract isn't showing Emergency Services as a purchased service for Product {!Case.Product}.
Please review customer coverage and take the necessary actions.
If you would like to view or update your case online, please click here.
